title: Chlory : The Ocean Guard v1.2.3
description:
######## NEW Version Released ########

* Some Level Upgrade
* More Free Sunlight
* Tutorial Added

######## LAUNCH EVENT ########

Free 150 sunlights upon installation
More free Sunlights

######## FEATURES ########

- 5 Chapters with 100 ocean levels
- Free updates regularly. Stay tuned!
- Chlory has 6 hidden powers to boost his chlorophyll
- 5 different characters to fight against
- In-app purchase of sunlight to help Chlory
- Detailed ocean view & catchy soundtracks per chapter

######## HOW TO PLAY ########

Connect Chlorophyll by a simple Ã¢â‚¬Å“drag & dropÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ from Chlory to the targeted enemy & disconnect chlorophyll for faster attack
Enemy contamination level diminishes as feeding chlorophyll into the enemy
Each stage is cleared by eliminating all the enemies at presence.

What's New:

ver 1.0.1 : Performance Optimization
ver 1.1.2 : Tutorial added ! More sunlights !
ver 1.2.0 : More Levels ! New episode !
